transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan Sakshi sir good evening.
Executive: Haan good evening boliye.
Executive: Ji Ashraf baat kar raha tha IndiaMART ke head office se kaise ho aap?
Customer: Haan main theek hoon sir.
Executive: Ji main keh raha tha kuch problem aa rahi thi kya leads aur inquiries mein?
Customer: Haan sir proper inquiries nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Matlab kab se proper inquiry nahi aa rahi hai mam matlab char din pehle se?
Customer: Pichle 15-20 din se.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Matlab particularly wo solar beacon light ke beacon light ke hi zyada inquiries hai baki to jo parts hai uske regarding to kuch nahi hai inquiry.
Executive: Beacon light ki zyada aa rahi hai haan?
Customer: Haan wo to hai usme hum usme bhi deal karte hi hai lekin hai na uske alawa bhi aur bhi parts hai na uske uski itni inquiry nahi aa rahi hai sir.
Executive: Achcha achcha ek minute.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Achcha aaj koi call aayi hogi aapke paas customer ki direct din mein ek do kisi aaj kisi buyer ki call aayi thi direct aapke paas?
Customer: Ek minute haan kyunki buyer ki call aayi thi mujhe jakda.
Executive: Haan 11 baje 12 baje.
Customer: Haan aate rehte hai sir.
Executive: Achcha theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Fir main dekh pa raha hoon solar LED beacon light ki bhi aayi hai inquiries hmm call theek hai matlab aaj ke date mein fir kal bhi aayi thi to forklift LED beacon ki aayi thi.
Customer: Haan wahi most of hai na beacon light ke regarding zyada mil rahi hai inquiries.
Executive: Theek hai mam ek minute main samajh gaya.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab hamare jo products hai forklift LED beacon jo aapka mam product hai ye recently aapne add kiya tha kya?
Customer: Ye 16 mein recently add kiya hoga.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai ek minute.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur basically aap log jo kaam aap log ka hai forklift parts mein hai.
Customer: Haan forklift mein parts mein safety ye to safety lights ho gaye baki forklift parts bhi rehte hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai abhi koshish aap ye karo ki India pe jaise location jo hai na aap India pe select karke theek hai aur fir recent pe aap click karke fir aap lead uthana mujhe lag raha hai ki aapka jo ye matlab beacon wala hai na iski by lead ka consumption idhar recently aapne kar liya hoga zyada shayad is wajah se wo aapka kya kaha aapne main samjhi nahi.
Executive: Mam meri voice cut cut ke to nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi properly aa rahi hai.
Executive: Achcha theek hai fir se main bolta hoon mujhe aisa lag raha hai aapka jo by lead hai recently jo hai idhar beacon ki zyada consume kar li hai isliye se jo hai AI based hai na mam jaise apna by lead ka consumption agar jaise jaise matlab clients karte hai na to uske according jo hai by leads zyada jane lagti hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Theek hai na haan.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To rukiye main fir bhi ek minute main dekhta hoon ek minute by lead transaction history se mujhe dikh jayega.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Real report card jaise aaj aapne ek kari hai Toyota fir forklift spare parts ki kari hai hai na fir Godrej and Voltas forklift spare parts ki bhi kari hai.
Customer: Haan hmm.
Executive: Fir Nitish forklift reverse font ki bhi li thi Manish naam se fir solar LED beacon light ki chalo aapko dikhegi to sochoge chalo le lete hai hai na jaise to lena nahi chahte honge aap zyada hai na aur 22 tarikh ko bhi aapne beacon light ki li hai 22 ko fir se beacon light ki li thi.
Customer: Most of beacon light ki hai sir.
Executive: Haan haan LED beacon ki zyada aa rahi hai mujhe lagta hai ye chota product hai aur iski requirement zyada IndiaMART pe post ho rahi hai is wajah se match making ke through na aapko zyada show kar rahi hai but still agar aap chaah rahe ho thoda sa stop karne ke liye hai na to mera to suggestion ye rahega ki kuch dino ke liye apne jitne bhi beacon wale product hai na usko out of stock market mein kuch dino ke liye.
Customer: Kuch dino ke liye to isse kya hoga haan usse kya hoga ki other products ki lead aapko dikhe aur uska thoda consumption badh jayega fir jab aapko isko on karna ho to aap isko jo hai fir se active kar lena product to inactive mein rahega inactive se fir active kar lena do second lagega active karne mein aapko.
Customer: Haan barabar haan.
Executive: Aisa nahi kyunki LED beacon ka main dekh pa raha hoon ki aapke paas inquiry bhi zyada generate ho rahi hai aur by lead to khair dikh hi rahi hai hai ki nahi mam?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab Sakshi mam ek matlab ek cheez ye bhi jaanna chahta tha ki overall jo response hai IndiaMART se wo kaisa aa raha hai customer mil pa rahe hai nahi mil pa rahe hai business mil pa raha hai ki nahi?
Customer: Mil to raha hai aisa to nahi hai nahi mil raha hai but abhi thoda kam ho gaya hai sir.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Thoda kam ho gaya hai generally kaisa aata hai matlab ek month mein kitne deal close ho jate honge aapke?
Customer: Ek month mein approximately char panch to milte hi hai parties.
Executive: Char panch lead matlab convert ho jati hogi achcha okay haan.
Executive: Aapki jo services bhi hai na to wo bhi sir ne achchi kara rakhi hai kyunki aap as a premium supplier IndiaMART se dikhte ho aur khas kar jo hai do category forklift parts aur ye forklift battery connectors hai na ab dekho kya hua na mam idhar recently LED beacon ki light aapki na forklift forklift battery connector se bhi zyada aapne purchase kar li hai ye agar category ke comparison mein bhi lead kafi consume kar li aapne.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan to ab kya hai ki bhai jiski by lead ka consumption aapka zyada ho gaya to fir wo artificial intelligence pe ye lagta hai na ki iski hi requirement client ko zyada hogi to to isliye keh raha hoon jaise dekho bahut zyada zarurat na ho to activity na matlab inactive activity na karna aap aur agar lage ki haan LED beacon bhi hum bech sakte hai do char do char to fir aap fir se isko in stock kar lena aap.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Least hai na thoda sa kya hai zyada hi lead aane lagi hai iski to usko rokne ke purpose se ab dekho negative karana sahi nahi hai negative kara dunga to fir bilkul hi by lead iski nahi aayegi aapke paas.
Customer: Haan haan theek hai.
Executive: Haan theek hai main batata hoon.
Executive: Haan mam ek minute.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai aur aapka dekho bahut badhiya dekho score bahut achcha hai aapka 80% hai hai na call picking rate aap logo ki bahut achchi hai 85% hai teen mahine ka average bahut badhiya.
Executive: Aur matlab ek bas na ek category hai mujhe aapse jaan ni thi wo aap add karna chahte ho kya truck starter truck starter motor.
Customer: Truck starter motor ye to hamara nahi hai sir.
Executive: Isko na iski lead mam na do lead li gayi hai aapki company ke through.
Customer: Truck starter motor.
Executive: Main batata hoon kya karna hai aapko aap IndiaMART open hai aapke mein settings mein jaiye.
Customer: Haan settings mein haan.
Executive: By lead preferences mein jaiye right side corner mein by lead preferences hai.
Customer: Haan mila isme isme sabse neeche aa jaiye fir category preferences ko open karna hai aap.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Isme truck starter motor beech mein likha hai isko cross karke hata dijiye.
Customer: Ye based on your by lead consumption.
Executive: Haan haan haan haan isko wrong kar do isko matlab hatana hai yahan se remove karna hai.
Customer: Okay confirm kar dena.
Customer: Haan haan hat hat gaya.
Executive: Hat gaya ek aur ek aur refresh kar ek baar.
Executive: Chalo hat gaya ab.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving proper inquiries.

- Mostly receiving beacon light inquiries.



Resolution:

- Suggested to select India location.

- Suggested to put beacon lights out of stock.

- Guided to remove truck starter motor category.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, beacon light, category, indiaMART
